message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Alice, $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $70 for it, but I'm not sure I can go higher.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $100.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $100 is still a bit high for me. Let's split the difference and I'll take it for $85.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $85, Bob. I can offer it to you for $95, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
